answers.author: Pamela Muse
answers.text:
Anonymous - you might consider temporary contract staff for the library.  A good resource for you would be:
Tim Pickering, President & CEO
Interim Public Management
Local Government Executive Staffing Service
480.577.0949
tim@interimpublicmanagement.com
www.interimpublicmanagement.com

answers.author: Andy White
answers.text:
Also use library listservs, like PUBLIB.    There are librarians looking for experience and $$.  We used a retired librarian to help us with major projects in preparation for the move.

author: [Anonymous]
text: We are experiencing some retirements in our Library leadership.  Concurrently there is a study to regionalize library service delivery.  Any ideas or experience in "filling the gap" of key library staff while the regional study is underway?
title: Library in Transition
